item.title: Adding models renamed. (npc)
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

use ::npc why pnpc? pnpc doesnt work with custom npc’s only if you replace something like the old kbd into the new one. Dat kan je niet met custom dingen, die pnpc command alleen als je de oude kbd veranderd in een hd dan kan het anders niet.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding models renamed. (npc)
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

Could someone help me.
I want to add this:
http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=185789&highlight=dark+beast
to my renamed client. but this is nonrenamed…
So I tryed to rename it and this I added in entitydef:

if(i == 2783) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.readValues(stream); entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; entityDef.anIntArray94[0] = 10000; entityDef.name = "Dark beast"; entityDef.combatLevel = 139; entityDef.description = "A beast from the dark dimension.".getBytes(); }
I added the models in the model folder to and did add model 10000 in my client.
When I try pnpc 2783 I become invisible.
perhaps the code is wrong could someone explain me…?
thanks.

Note sorry about the link to r-s I dont know how I could explain it otherwise…
Note2: im DUTCH!

Read full topic
